name: Ashwin Dilip Adhav

projects.title: New Router Introduction

experience.title: Software Engineer

Directed a cross-functional team in the creation of a personalized customer journey in Salesforce Marketing Cloud, boosting customer retention rates by 25%.

experience.title: Salesforce Developer
